## Install from Github

Github repository: https://github.com/EnriquePH/OEIS.R

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("EnriquePH/OEIS.R")
```

## Load `OEIS.R` Package

```{r}
library(OEIS.R)
```

## S3 Class `OEIS_sequence`

```{r}
id <- "A003456"
A003456 <- OEIS_sequence(id)
class(A003456)
```

```{r}
A003456$ID
A003456$description
A003456$formerly
A003456$url
```


```{r}
plot(A003456$terms)
```
